name: One More Consult
description:
Medcomic.com

ONE MORE CONSULT is a funny educational point-and-click adventure made by Jorge Muniz for Medcomic+. Want to see more episodes? Leave me a comment!

Controls: Left click to move to a position. The magnifying glass icon indicates you've found an interactive element. Click with the hand icon to interact.

Support the development of Medcomic by following Jorge on Twitter and becoming a Medcomic+ member at Medcomic.com.

This game is for entertainment purposes only and does not represent medical advice.
